pageContent: Purpose: Rectourethral fistula is a known complication of prostate cancer treatment. Reports in the literature on rectourethral fistula repair technique and outcomes are limited to single institution series. We examined the variations in technique and outcomes of rectourethral fistula repair in a multi-institutional setting.

metaData.source:
[Recto-urethral fistula secondary to prostate cancer]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24531676/
